name: vibemap-constants
description: Design system and tokens. Other shared constants and configurations.

scripts.build-design-system: npm run build-semantic && cd design-system && style-dictionary build
scripts.build-semantic: cd design-system/semantic && npx gulp build-css build-assets
scripts.watch-semantic: cd design-system/semantic && yarn run build-semantic && gulp watch

author: Vibemap, Inc.
